data.message: #letter4u if you`re looking for the #truth #Message of ayatollah Seyyed Ali #Khamenei,#Leader of The Islamic Republic of Iran To the #Youth in #Europe and #North_America I hereby don’t address your statesmen b/c I believe that they’ve consciously separated politics from the righteousness and truth. #Letter4U I’m addressing you, the youth, because I find that sense of quest for truth is more vigorous in your hearts. #Letter4U
